D

deregisterPlayer() - Method in class net.lapismc.lapislogin.playerdata.LapisLoginAPIPlayer
Removes the password on a players account, if the player is online they will be logged out first and informed of if they are required to register again

LapisLoginAPI - Class in net.lapismc.lapislogin.api

Please don't use this!

LapisLoginAPIPlayer - Class in net.lapismc.lapislogin.playerdata

LoginEvent - Class in net.lapismc.lapislogin.api.events
 
LoginEvent(LapisLoginPlayer, String) - Constructor for class net.lapismc.lapislogin.api.events.LoginEvent
 
loginPlayer() - Method in class net.lapismc.lapislogin.playerdata.LapisLoginAPIPlayer
Forces the player to login, this bypasses the need for a password and should therefore be used with caution!
LogoutEvent - Class in net.lapismc.lapislogin.api.events
 
LogoutEvent(LapisLoginPlayer) - Constructor for class net.lapismc.lapislogin.api.events.LogoutEvent
 
logoutPlayer() - Method in class net.lapismc.lapislogin.playerdata.LapisLoginAPIPlayer
Sets the players logged in status to false, this will force the player to login again if they are online.

R

RegisterEvent - Class in net.lapismc.lapislogin.api.events
 
RegisterEvent(LapisLoginPlayer, String) - Constructor for class net.lapismc.lapislogin.api.events.RegisterEvent
 
registerPlayer(String) - Method in class net.lapismc.lapislogin.playerdata.LapisLoginAPIPlayer
Sets the players password, only works if the player isn't registered, it also informs the player of what their new password is.
